title: PML-N working towards economic stability: Irfan Siddiqui
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 23 (APP):Parliamentary Leader in the Senate, Senator Irfan Siddiqui, said on Friday that the Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz (PML-N) government was working towards economic stability.
During the leadership of Nawaz Sharif the country was on the path of progress and prosperity, he said while talking to a private news channel.
He said that the PTIÂ  founder was the mastermind behind the May 9 events, which were designed to destabilize the country.
The sole purpose of these events was to weaken the country, bring economic instability, and create anarchy, he added.
